summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered on August 19, 2002. It details transportation charges, discounts, and payment information, indicating a total amount due of $298.93. The invoice includes references to multiple shipments and their respective charges.
